item.title: Void problem
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

add this void

public void rulesmenu()
{ 

					sendQuest("@dre@RULES", 8144);  //Title
					clearQuestInterface();
					sendQuest("@red@R@whi@U@red@L@whi@E@red@S @whi@1@red@-@whi@1@red@4", 8145);
					sendQuest("@red@1-No Summoning equals automatic ban!!", 8147);
                  			sendQuest("@red@2-No spamming ", 8148);
					sendQuest("@red@3-No insulting players or staff ", 8149);
					sendQuest("@red@4-No setitem will = automatic ban", 8150);
					sendQuest("@red@5-No trying to buy admin or mod ", 8151);
					sendQuest("@red@6-No asking for mod or admin ", 8152);
					sendQuest("@red@7-No pking people with less than 4 items", 8153); 
					sendQuest("@red@8-No using black armour while pking", 8154);
					sendQuest("@red@9-No less than 4 item pking", 8155);
					sendQuest("@red@10-No ::noclip automatic ban	", 8156);									sendQuest("@red@11-join server forums @ http://pkservers.21.forumer.com", 8157);
}

and add this command

	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("rules"))
	{
		
		rulesmenu();
	
	}

thats better =)

}

}
if(line2 == 8146) {

try { characterfile.close(); } catch(IOException ioexception) { }
